Doesn't want to play files from phone  like Chromecast. It's OK. Don't give up cable, dish or Netflix for it though.

review: The Fire Stick allowed me to have a smart TV without having to deal with the crappy user interface of a smart TV. I love the ability to customize the interface to my desires. It is compact, sleek and lighting quick with plenty of storage for all my apps and games. A great product for the price point.
author: Cleric1stClass

review: So, I've got to say, I had high hopes and was rather disappointed in this device.  I've used it on vacation for almost two weeks and in a nutshell, if you're streaming content from Amazon, it's fantastic.  If you want to use it to stream from any place else (Netflix, Hulu, HBO GO, etc.) forget about it.  The Amazon video is perfect and smooth.  All other content is slow to load, choppy to play, and can be downright frustrating.  I own a Roku Box and and Apple TV and thought this would be a fun little portable device for traveling.  Don't waste your time - I wish I'd skipped this and just brought my Roku.
author: Matthew I. Halpern
